scripts.start: export NODE_ENV='production' PORT=8080 && npm run start:prod
scripts.start:dev: export NODE_ENV='development' PORT=3000 && npm run build:prep:builddir && npm run build:client:dev:static && npm run serve:dev
scripts.start:int: export NODE_ENV='integration' PORT=8080 && npm run start:prod
scripts.start:prod: npm run build:prep:builddir && parallelshell 'npm run build:server' 'npm run build:client' && npm run serve
scripts.build:client: npm run build:img && npm run build:css && webpack
scripts.build:client:dev: export NODE_ENV='development' && npm run build:img && npm run build:css && webpack -d
scripts.build:client:dev:auto: export NODE_ENV='development' && npm run build:img && npm run build:css && webpack -d --watch
scripts.build:client:dev:static: npm run build:img && npm run build:css
scripts.build:prep:builddir: rm -rf ./build/* && mkdir build/log && npm run build:prep:symlink
scripts.build:prep:symlink: mkdir build/node_modules && cd build && npm install ../node_modules/wavy && cd -
scripts.check: npm run flow && npm run lint && npm run test:coverage:check
scripts.test:coverage: export NODE_ENV='test' && nyc npm run test
scripts.test:coverage:check: export NODE_ENV='test' && nyc --check-coverage npm run test
scripts.foo:prod: npm run build:prep:builddir && npm run build:server && npm run serve
scripts.foo:dev: npm run build:prep:builddir && npm run serve:dev
